introduction: It is Sunday and filmmaker Drew Lee Temple is looking, to sell his feature film, 'Sunday' in Hollywood. Justin (Justin Phillip) is traveling from Kansas in an effort to film the actual movie. Justin lounges around his rented house with his best friend Michael (Michael Linowitz) a loud, outgoing character. Michael's problem is that he tends to sleep, rather than work. This has lead to trouble with Brandon (Brandon Notch), a local drug dealer, who now wants his money back or Justin and Michael is in trouble. Then there's Michelle , an Instagram-famous "influencer" whose (Michelle Janine), Justin's love interest. Upon learning about the problem, Joe Chambrello (Joe Chambrello) a nosey neighbor, arrived on the scene. Hoping to capture live action on film, Lara (Lara Pictet), the two live crew set up video cameras. A lot can happen while lounging around your house on a Sunday. Written by Drew Lee Temple
